snippet.title: Pools of Darkness gameplay (PC Game, 1991)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Pools of Darkness, Dos PC game produced by SSI in 1991 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/pools-of-darkness/8469/
Watching the intro and checking out some combat action in this fantasy adventure.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Might and Magic: Swords of Xeen - https://youtu.be/nd8JDh0kHSs
Might and Magic: Secret of the inner Santum - https://youtu.be/fAnP_JF_m_Y
Akalabeth - https://youtu.be/jNlEfzXi8D0
